comment.language: For the Commemoration of St. Mary Magdalene:

text.language: Palac etjwjeb ouoh n~refernobi: nas~jemjom an ecaji: m~p~taio n~y/eyouab: Maria ]magdalin/.
My weak and sinful tongue, will not be able to speak, of the honor of the holy, Mary Magdalene.

language.div: Lidahku yang lemah dan berdosa takkan mampu ceritakan kemuliaan kudus St. Maria Magdalena.

text.language: لسانى الضعيف الخاطىء: لايقدر أن ينطق: بكرامة القديسة: مريم المجدلية.
Yetacswrp m~mosi: n~ca P,#c# Pennou]: afhioui~ e~bol n~q/tc: m~pisasf n~demon.
Who first followed, Christ our Lord; He cast out of her, seven demons.

language.div: Dia-lah yang pertama ikut Tuhan kita Yesus Kristus; dari dirinya, Ia usir tujuh roh jahat.

text.language: التى تبعت أولاً: المسيح إلهنا: وأخرج منها: سبعة شياطين.
Acsemsi m~Pencwt/r: nem nefa~poctoloc eyouab: acermeyre m~pefm~kah: ouoh pefmou n~reftanqo.
Who served our Savior, and His holy apostles, and witnessed his suffering, and His life-giving death.

language.div: Dia layani Juruselamat kita dan para rasul-Nya yang kudus, saksikan penderitaan-Nya dan kematian-Nya yang memberi hidup.

text.language: هى خدمت مخلصنا: وتلاميذه القديسين: وشهدت آلامه وموته المحيى.
Aci~ e~pim~hau n~sorp: nacfai m~picojen: ouoh aco~hi e~ratc cabol: qen ninehpi nem nirimi.
She came early to the tomb, carrying the myrrh, and stood outside, with lamentations and weeping.

language.div: Ia datang pagi-pagi ke kubur, bawa minyak mur, berdiri di luar, dengan tangisan dan ratapan.

text.language: جاءت أولاً الى القبر: حاملة الطيب: ووقفت خارجا: بنحيبٍ وبكاء.
Acnau e~aggeloc c~nau euhemci: afouonhf on n~je Po#c#: afcaji nemac m~pair/]: mase ne ha nac~n/ou...
She saw two angels sitting, the Lord also appeared to her, and spoke with her like this: “go to my brethren...

language.div: Ia lihat dua malaikat duduk. Tuhan juga menampakkan diri padanya, berkata: "Pergilah pada saudara-saudara-Ku...

text.language: رأت ملاكين جالسين: وظهر لها الرب أيضا: وتكلم معها هكذا: "اذهبى الى اخوتى...
Ouoh ajoc nwou: ]nase n/i epswi ha: paiwt e~te peteniwt pe: nem panou] e~te petennou] pe.
And say to them: I am ascending, to My Father and your Father; and My God and your God.”

language.div: Katakan pada mereka: Aku akan pergi kepada Bapa-Ku dan Bapamu; kepada Allah-Ku dan Allahmu."

text.language: وقولى لهم: ’انى سأصعد: الى ابى الذى هو ابوكم: والهى الذى هو الهكم.‘"
<ere y/etachiw~is m~may/t/c: n~te ]a~nactacic m~Po#c#: ,ere y/etacswpi n~]diakonoc: e~bol hiten nia~poctoloc.
Hail to her who preached, the resurrection of the Lord to the disciples, hail to who was ordained, a deaconess by the apostles.

language.div: Salam bagi dia yang wartakan kebangkitan Tuhan pada para murid. Salam bagi dia yang ditahbiskan menjadi diaken oleh para rasul.

text.language: السلام للتى بشرت التلاميذ: بقيامة الرب: السلام للتى صارت شماسة: من قبل الرسل.
Twbh m~Po#c# e~h~r/i e~jwn: w~ ]may/t/c n~te P,#c#: ]a~gia Maria ]magdalin/: n~tef ,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf, O the disciple of Christ; St. Mary Magdalene, that He may forgive us our sins.

language.div: Mohonlah pada Tuhan demi kami, ya murid Kristus, St. Maria Magdalena, agar Ia mengampuni dosa-dosa kami.

text.language: اطلبى من الرب عنا: ياتلميذة المسيح: القديسة مريم المجدلية: ليغفر لنا خطايانا.
